title: why pixel 3a has super res zoom, topshot and photo booth a cheaper phone and pixel 2 doesn't have it
content: I dont know why the google has given the features like top shot and the photo booth and the super res zoom fot the pixel 3a a cheaper phone with low grade soc and doesn't have the pixel visual core and not give those features to pixel 2 which has the hardware common google answer me.... I've send feedbacks no one's ever answered me
